show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips review the new DVD release of the Oliver Stone’ and Peter Kiznick’s The Untold History... <!--more--> of the United States.
Deeply researched by an American University team of historians, the ten hour Showtime documentary seriesis a provocative challenge to the status quo of American history in the tradition of Howard Zinn’s People’s History of the United State.
The film series covers the rise of the American Empire and national security state from the late nineteenth century through the Obama administration.
